text: Histeria! also known onscreen as Warner Bros. Histeria! is an American animated musical comedy series created by Tom Ruegger and produced by Warner Bros. Animation. aired in Kids WB from September 14, 1998 to March 31, 2000. ==Plot== Histeria! features Father Time talks involving of the history events and pop cultures. ==Cast== * Frank Welker as Father Time * Laraine Newman as Ms. Information, Charity Bazaar * Tress MacNeille as World's Oldest Woman, Pepper Mills, Toast, Cho-Cho * Luke Ruegger as Big Fat Baby * Cody Ruegger as Loud Kiddington * Nathan Ruegger as Froggo * Cree Summer as Aka Pella * Nora Dunn as Lydia Karaoke * Paul Rugg as Nostradamus * Rob Paulsen as Mr. Smartypants * Jeff Bennett as Lucky Bob * James Wickline as Bill Straightman * Billy West as Chit Chatterson == References == Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:American animated television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Histeria!
